Package com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventInjectionStrategy
    Injects Events into the application under test.
    IdlingResourceRegistry.IdleNotificationCallback  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncTaskPoolMonitor
    Provides a way to monitor AsyncTask's work queue to ensure that there is no work pending or executing (and to allow notification of idleness).
    AsyncTaskPoolMonitorTest
    Unit test for AsyncTaskPoolMonitor
    BaseLayerModule
    Dagger module for creating the implementation classes within the base package.
    BaseLayerModule.FailureHandlerHolder
    Holder for AtomicReference which allows updating it at runtime.
    DefaultFailureHandler
    Espresso's default FailureHandler.
    DefaultFailureHandlerTest
    Tests Espresso's default failure handling.
    EventInjector
    Responsible for selecting the proper strategy for injecting MotionEvents to the application under test.
    EventInjectorTest
    Tests for EventInjector.
    IdlingResourceIntegrationTest
    Integration test with IdlingResources.
    IdlingResourceRegistry
    Keeps track of user-registered IdlingResources.
    IdlingResourceRegistryTest
    Unit tests for IdlingResourceRegistry.
    InputManagerEventInjectionStrategy
    An EventInjectionStrategy that uses the input manager to inject Events.
    LooperIdlingResource
    An Idling Resource Adapter for Loopers.
    OnDemandIdlingResource
    An IdlingResource for testing that becomes idle on demand.
    QueueInterrogator
    Isolates the nasty details of touching the message queue.
    RootsOracle
    Provides access to all root views in an application.
    RootViewPicker
    Provides the root View of the top-most Window, with which the user can interact.
    ThreadPoolExecutorExtractor
    Extracts ThreadPoolExecutors used by pieces of android.
    UiControllerImpl
    Implementation of UiController.
    UiControllerImplIntegrationTest
    Test for UiControllerImpl.
    UiControllerImplTest
    Unit test for UiControllerImpl.
    ViewFinderImpl
    Implementation of ViewFinder.
    ViewFinderImplTest
    Unit tests for ViewFinderImpl.
    WindowManagerEventInjectionStrategy
    An EventInjectionStrategy that uses the window manager to inject MotionEvents.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    QueueInterrogator.QueueState  
    UiControllerImpl.IdleCondition
    Responsible for signaling a particular condition is met / verifying that signal.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CompatAsyncTask
    Annotates a AsyncTaskMonitor as monitoring the CompatAsyncTask pool
    Default
    Annotates a default provider.
    MainThread
    Annotates an Executor that executes tasks on the main thread
    SdkAsyncTask
    Annotates a AsyncTaskMonitor as monitoring the SdkAsyncTask pool
